entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione's wand gave a little jerk, but did not leave her hand. She whispered to Harry that she thinks the Blasting Curse rebounded and hit his wand.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry's wand split into two again. He stared at it in shock and felt empty.

entities.name: bathildas secret
entities.description: The book 'Bathilda's Secret' is mentioned as a location where they were leaving.

entities.name: blasting curse
entities.description: Hermione cast the Blasting Curse which rebounded and hit Harry's wand.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron broke his wand in an accident and had to get a new one.

entities.name: ollivander
entities.description: Ollivander was kidnapped and held hostage by someone.

relationships.description: Hermione apologized to Harry for accidentally hitting his wand with the Blasting Curse.
The Blasting Curse rebounded and hit Harry's wand.
Ron broke his wand in an accident.
Ollivander was kidnapped and held hostage by someone.
